statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New%'
SELECT customer_id, income FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND income > 50000 ORDER BY gender ASC, location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_demographics GROUP BY location HAVING total_customers > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE preferences->>'interest' = 'Sports' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND income BETWEEN 30000 AND 70000 ORDER BY income DESC, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, location FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT customer_id, name FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM Customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM Customers WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY location ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_type DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_location FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 'f4d56cf9-91d5-4f5a-b321-92623f3367d0' AND preference_type = 'Discount';
SELECT strategy_name, target_gender, target_age_range, target_location FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'New York' LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, location, preference_type, preference_value FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_preferences ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id WHERE age <= 40 AND preference_type = 'Promotion' ORDER BY location, preference_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity*price) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, email
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_spend FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spend > 1000
SELECT p.customer_id, p.product_name, f.feedback_text FROM purchases p INNER JOIN feedback f ON p.customer_id = f.customer_id
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, MAX(f.rating) AS highest_rating FROM customers c LEFT JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, location FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND marital_status = 'Married'
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_score FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Technology'
